snippet: A federal appeals court has dealt a grievous blow to the reproductive health and rights of Texas women.
abstract: Editorial decries decision by federal appellate panel allowing Texas to enforce provision of new abortion law that requires doctors who perform the procedure to have admitting privileges at a nearby hospital; argues provision is a grievous blow to the reproductive health and rights of Texas women, and that it should be reviewed by Supreme Court.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court has dealt a grievous blow to the reproductive health and rights of Texas women.

headline.main: A Bad Reversal on the Texas Abortion Law
headline.print_headline: A Bad Reversal on the Texas Abortion Law
